name: NHS England Low Priority Treatment - doxazosin modified release
title: Doxazosin modified release cost per 1000 patients
description: Cost of doxazosin modified release per 1000 patients
why_it_matters: Doxazosin is a drug used to treat hypertension. the modified release (MR) version is more expensive than standard release with no clear benefits.
numerator_where: bnf_code LIKE '0205040D0AAAQAQ%' OR --Doxazosin Mesil_Tab 4mg M/R (brands and generic)
bnf_code LIKE '0205040D0AAARAR%' --Doxazosin Mesil_Tab 8mg M/R (brands and generic)
